tool_description: This API gives you the ability to auto-login your users from your website into loyalty program websites. In many cases you can also take a user to a specific page within the target website. The user only has to provide his or her credentials once and then you will be able to "single sign on" the user automatically whenever needed. For more details please contact us at http://awardwallet.com/contact.php
name: AwardWallet - Web Parsing - Autologin with deep linking
title: AwardWallet - Web Parsing - Autologin with deep linking
tool_name: AwardWallet - Web Parsing - Autologin with deep linking

api_list.name: PrepareRedirect
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://awardwallet-autologin-with-deep-linking.p.rapidapi.com/PrepareRedirect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "awardwallet-autologin-with-deep-linking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
